data.eml:eml: Six new species of Afrotropical Allodia (Diptera: Mycetophilidae): DNA barcodes indicate recent diversification with a single origin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magnussen, Trude, Kjaerandsen, Jostein, Johnsen, Arild, Søli, Geir E. E. (2018): Six new species of Afrotropical Allodia (Diptera: Mycetophilidae): DNA barcodes indicate recent diversification with a single origin. Zootaxa 4407 (3): 301-320, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.3.1
